TopicTitle: BEEP Sound for Stayputnik when entering space

Articles.Content:
Hi

Could someone write a plugin who will make the Stayputnik pobe core beep the real Sputnik sounds (maybe 5 seconds) when it enters space ?

This would be so cool! 

I would do it myself but i cant programm.

Thanks a lot!
There's Chatterer for that (except maybe for the "in space" condition).
I know of Chatter and as you also pointed it does some random beeping but it is not bound to the Stayputnik Part and on the condition when moving into space.

There was a mod that did something like that, Think it was Dong fang hong will try and found it.

EDIT- Can't found the thread it was by simonArtisan and looking at it he has a DLL file and sound folder.
